txt.en: The Glittering Caves
<rgb=#00FF00>The crystal has been saved!</rgb>
The enemy has found a path around our defences! Defend Gimli while he works to cave in the tunnel entrance!
Enemies are charging across the centre bridge! Protect Gamling as he uses the ballista!

With the destruction of the Wall, Gimli and Eómer now rally any they can find to hold the line and protect all huddled within.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Soldier defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Commander defeated
- Banner burned
The cavern is being swarmed by large spiders! Defend the Glowing Crystal and defeat their queen!
Sappers are attempting to destroy the barricades near the bridges! Assist Gamling in protecting them!
'The enemy has constructed camps and traps on the path out of the Glittering Caves! Clear a path through the encampments to allow one final charge!
Orc Defilers are trying to reach the civilians in the middle of the Glittering Caves! Defend them from the final assault!
Withstand the enemy waves and protect the civilians at the centre of the Glittering Caves.
<rgb=#FF0000>The enemy has reached the civilians!</rgb>
Defend the Glittering Caves
<rgb=#FF0000>Gimli was forced to cave in the tunnel entrance!</rgb>
Gimli, Eómer, and Gamling must survive
<rgb=#00FF00>A path has been cleared out of the Glittering Caves!</rgb>
[placeholder] Soldiers Defeated
<rgb=#FF0000>The Uruk Bosses still block the exit from the Glittering Caves!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The defences have held and our barricades still stand!</rgb>
[placeholder] Commanders Defeated
<rgb=#FF0000>The enemy has destroyed the barricades at the bridge!</rgb>
[placeholder] Banners Burned
<rgb=#00FF00>The ballista has been saved and the enemy has been pushed back!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The enemy has overrun the bridges and have destroyed the ballista!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>All enemies defeated before Gimli had to cause the cave in!</rgb>
blah
<rgb=#00FF00>The civilians have been saved!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The spiders have covered the crystal!</rgb>
